articles.title: Eid celebrations
articles.contents:
There are 2 different types of Eid that Muslims celebrate:Eid al‚Äôfitr and Eid al‚Äôadha.
Eid al‚Äôfitr marks the end of Ramadan [the fasting period]
Eid al‚Äôadha marks the end of the Hajj period and also commemorates the time the Prophet Ibrahim was willing to sacrifice his son but instead ended up sacrificing a ram.
this is why Muslims do something called ‚Äúqurbani‚Äù which is where they sacrifice an animal the same way the prophet did.
